title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Baptisma chang hi lo lawm la 583
Beram vengtu tha tak chuanin 537
Berampute beram venga Zana an thut khawmin 85
Beramputen Beram venga phula an riah chilh laiin 87
Bethlehem arsi chu a lo eng 122
Bethlehem mual tlaitla engah 105
Boral tur chhandam ru chaute enkawl ru 317
Boralte zawng turin Krista a lo kal 340
